Plot: Sid a reclusive customer service agent, breaks up with his girlfriend, Karri, and then tries to fight his sadness by venturing out of his comfort zone and reconnecting with the outside ...
Title: Personal Space
Writer: Mark Kinash (story), Amelia Macisaac, James McDougall, Elli Raynai (story), Elli Raynai, Stephanie Seaton
